
when the form is submited make instead send the credentials to IRC server at wss://irc.h4ks.com:8087 in the room #lobby. It is an irc server over bwebsockets
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
